# Intro/Overview

# Setting Up

## Loading Libraries

```{r}
#| label: loading-libraries
#| warning: false
#| output: false
library(tidyverse) # who doesn't want to be tidy?
library(gt) # for nice tables
library(sf) # for handling geo data
library(here) # reproducible file paths
library(htmltools) # making html labels
library(htmlwidgets) # saving final map
library(leafpop) # pop-up with images
library(leaflet) # mapping



```

## Loading Data

Reading in the data.

```{r}
#| label: loading-data
 retractions <- read_csv("retractions.csv")
```

By publisher

```{r}
retractions %>% group_by(Publisher) %>% count(sort = TRUE) %>% head()
```
